quote: I've been interested in dreams myself for a long time, and it's a big part of the Indian tradition, especially where I was brought up in Calcutta in my family, which is quite traditional.
quote_letters: IVE BEEN INTERESTED IN DREAMS MYSELF FOR A LONG TIME AND ITS A BIG PART OF THE INDIAN TRADITION ESPECIALLY WHERE I WAS BROUGHT UP IN CALCUTTA IN MY FAMILY WHICH IS QUITE TRADITIONAL
